check_exception Class Reference

Detailed Description

Exception class, that can be used to handle exceptions.

When an exception is thrown, this class offers methods to store the type of occurred exception and to return it, when the exception is handled.

Example
  ...
  try 
  {
      // Code, where check exceptions can occurr:
      ...
  }
  // Handle the exceptions:
  catch ( check_exception &check ) 
  {
      cout << "Error: Check exception thrown!" << endl;
      // Extract check exception type:
      cout << "Exception type: " << check.what() << endl;
      exit( 8 );
  }

what_arg is stored in desc, so it can be queried by method what later.
